product_name: CliniqueExtra Gentle Cleansing Foam for Dry + Sensitive Skin
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Extra Gentle Cleansing Foam is a plush, velvety-soft foam that cleanses even sensitive skins with care.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Very Dry to Dry CombinationNon-irritating formula ever-so-gently lifts dirt and impuritiesLeaves skin feeling fresh and comfortable - never tight or dryDermatologist and ophthalmologist testedNon-acnegenicAllergy testedFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilDenatured alcoholSynthetic colorsSLSSLESGlutenFragranceItem 2302017How To UseUse twice a day, morning and night. Lather between palms with tepid water. Massage over makeup-free face. Rinse thoroughly; pat skin dry. Follow with Steps 2 and 3: Clarifying Lotion and Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, Gel or Cream.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Glycerin, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, Butylene Glycol, Sucrose, Lauramidopropyl Betaine, Gentiana Lutea (Gentian) Root Extract, Algae Extract, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Coco Pg-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caffeine, Caprylyl Glycol, PEG / PPG-18 / 18 Dimethicone, Citric Acid, Capryloyl Glycine, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use twice a day, morning and night. Lather between palms with tepid water. Massage over makeup-free face. Rinse thoroughly; pat skin dry. Follow with Steps 2 and 3: Clarifying Lotion and Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, Gel or Cream.
ingredients: Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: Smells like Chemicals
reviews.comments: I second Dawn of Texas.  I can't believe the chemical smell, like petroleum.  This cleanser is not up to Clinique's standards.

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: it makes my face feel clean and fresh

reviews.headline: Smells like strong chemicals
reviews.comments: The first time I used this "gentle" cleanser, I had to immediately double check that I had the right product because of the very strong chemical smell. I can't think of any face product I've EVER used that smells like it came from my husbands garage! I does a wonderful job of removing makeup but I wouldn't feel comfortable using it daily. I'm rather shocked that its labeled a gentle cleanser since it smells like it would take the paint off a car or furniture, lol!

reviews.headline: Continuously use this
reviews.comments: LOVE this for my facewash. Its so gentle and smells great

reviews.headline: Most definitely will buy it again.
reviews.comments: I love the product.

reviews.headline: Made my face so dry it hurt!
reviews.comments: Was recommended by store for very dry sensitive skin w/ Rosacea. 2 days using this w/ matching Clinique moisturizer my face was redder dryer and cracking. RETURNED!  On sister's advice now use Andalou Naturals Apricot Probiotic Cleansing Milk.

reviews.headline: works great!
reviews.comments: This cleanser works wonderfully for dry sensitive skin! I love this product!

reviews.headline: Drying
reviews.comments: This product dries my skin out like I couldn't believe. I literally have lines on my face and dry patches all over  from my skin being so tight and dry. This is even after using a high quality moisturizer after cleansing

reviews.headline: Favorite
reviews.comments: This is my favorite cleanser!

reviews.headline: A Cleanser for Oilier Days
reviews.comments: THIS IS NOT AN EVERYDAY CLEANSER FOR DRY/ECZEMA PRONE SKIN. However, this cleanser is VERY GOOD and NON IRRITATING if you don't use it everyday. I suggest this cleanser for days when you feel oiler/dirtier. For regular days a non-foaming cleanser is best for dry/eczema prone skin. I specifically bought this product for the purpose of 1-2 days a week use for oily days and I have a non foaming cleanser for everyday use. (I have dry skin and mild eczema) if you have bad eczema and very sensitive skin this product may irritate your skin and dry it out.

reviews.headline: Smells terrible!
reviews.comments: Returning tomorrow smells awful and it drys out my skin!

reviews.headline: Best for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I have sensitive oily and blemish prone skin that gets worse when I use too many acne skin products. I absolutely love this cleansing foam! It removes all my oil, dirt, spf, and makeup with just 1 wash. My skin is less irritated and less red now. I enjoy the lightness of the foam and my face feels clean. Highly recommend to everyone!

reviews.headline: Would purchase again
reviews.comments: First time using. I have eczema and this works well for my face.

reviews.headline: Great cleanser for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: It's hard for me to find a cleanser I can use regularly due to my senstive skin.  I've bought this cleanser over and over again and it works great for me.

reviews.headline: My face dosen't feel stiff after I wash my face. Love it.
reviews.comments: I use this day and night just one pump or two if you have makeup on.

reviews.headline: Harsh Smell
reviews.comments: I can't seem to get past the smell. I want to love it but I can't imagine continuing to put anything that smells like straight chemicals/acetone on my face. It's enough to make your eyes burn. I've tried it twice, nothing special so far. It didn't cause a breakout or reaction which is nice for my sensitive skin but man I am struggling to keep using it with the smell.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I use this to wash my face twice daily. It makes my face feel really clean and helps fight my acne.

reviews.headline: would buy again
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this foaming face wash. I have dry skin, more so in the winter. This feels so gentle on my face and does not leave it feeling stripped after washing. I'm just happy that I decided to try something new, I will not switch now!

reviews.headline: Cleans well without drying
reviews.comments: I've only used non-foaming cleansers for the past decade, but a bout of dermatitis led me to try something new, despite my hesitation that anything foaming would be too drying. This cleanser does not leave my skin dry or tight, but does a great job of cleaning; when I follow it up with micellar water there is never any makeup or residue left. It does not lead to any stinging, even on the most irritated areas of skin. It's a good follow-up for oil cleansing as well, but it does such a good job cleansing on its own that I don't bother double cleansing on days I don't wear makeup. I would recommend this to anyone with dry or sensitive skin who wants to be sure their skin is clean but not stripped.

reviews.headline: I buy this product over and over.
reviews.comments: I have used Clinique products since I was 25 I am now 71! They have added products for aging skin and they are wonderful products!

never irritates my extremely sensitive skin

faceoff_positive.comments: I was having repetitive episodes of contact dermatitis that's was all over my eyes. The breakouts were red, dry and painful! It seemed like. Everything that I put on my face caused a new breakout or furthered the problem. The only thing I could tolerate was Vaseline. My hair stylist recommend this cleanser because she said so needed to clean any bacteria on my skin to resolve the problem. I tired this cleanser and it truly help saved my skin! Using it twice daily along with Vaseline at first and later Clinique moisture surge overnight mask, I was able to resolve my contact dermatitis and get my skin back to normal. I still use this cleanse daily to keep my skin clean it has kept any further contact dermatitis from developing and has never caused my dry sensitive skin any issues, thank you Clinique!
faceoff_positive.headline: This cleanser cleared up my horrible contact dermatitis!

faceoff_negative.comments: The first time I used this "gentle" cleanser, I had to immediately double check that I had the right product because of the very strong chemical smell. I can't think of any face product I've EVER used that smells like it came from my husbands garage! I does a wonderful job of removing makeup but I wouldn't feel comfortable using it daily. I'm rather shocked that its labeled a gentle cleanser since it smells like it would take the paint off a car or furniture, lol!
faceoff_negative.headline: Smells like strong chemicals
